This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

cn.releaseNotes: 添加：第2章-插入排序和归并排序添加描述文档；
cn.description:
参照原书第三版，内容包括：
    第2章 算法入门：插入排序，归并排序；
    第4章 分治法：最大子集问题，矩阵相乘算法[常规算法，分治法，Strassen算法]；
    第6章 堆排序：堆排序[大根堆，小根堆]；
    第7章 快速排序：快速排序；
    第8章 线性时间排序：计数排序；
    第12章 二叉搜索树：二叉搜索树[中序遍历，递归搜索，迭代搜索，迭代最小，迭代最大，后继，先驱，插入，删除]；
    第13章 红黑树：红黑树[插入，删除]；
    第15章 动态规划：切钢条问题[递归，自顶向下，自底向上，打印]，最长公共子序列；
    第16章 贪心算法：活动选择问题[递归，迭代]，Huffman编码；
    第22章 基本图算法：广度优先搜索，深度优先搜索，拓扑排序，强连通分量；
    第23章 最小生成树：最小生成树[Kruskal算法，Prim算法];
    第24章 单源最短路径：Bellman-Ford算法，有向无环图算法，Dijkstra算法；
    第25章 每对顶点间的最短路径：最短路径算法[Slow算法，Faster算法，Floyd-Warshall算法]；
    第26章 最大流：Ford-Fulkerson算法；
    附加内容：Hanoi塔问题，N皇后问题，排序算法性能比较；

主要特点有：
    可单步或连续运行伪码，观察参数和数据结构的变化，有助于理解算法的设计思想；
    可设置程序断点，方便观察算法的断点状态，通过循环不变式验证其正确性；
    提供运行时函数栈，并标记函数返回位置，可轻松跟踪递归函数的运行过程，并有助于理解计算机程序的运行机制；
    记录代码行执行次数，有助于理解算法的时间复杂度；

希望此App能对您学习算法和数据结构有所帮助；

cn.description:
# 100万Safari浏览器用户的选择，新一代浏览器扩展平台。

Stay是一款Safari浏览器扩展功能增强应用，借助Stay可以极大的提升Safari浏览器的浏览体验和可玩性。

Stay支持苹果全平台，并且一次付费即可涵盖 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 设备。

安装Stay后，你的Safari浏览器增加了什么功能？
- 【用户脚本】安装或者编写用户脚本，让你的Safari支持自动翻页、沉浸式翻译、防止跳转、聚合搜索等等功能。
- 【文件下载】增强Safari浏览器中的文件下载，可以选择下载到分类的文件夹，方便管理下载资源。
- 【广告拦截】支持Adguard、uBlock Origin、AdBlock Plus等基于EasyList规范的过滤规则，让你的浏览更加安全和洁净。

买断Stay Pro
- 全平台同步脚本内容以及设置。
- 添加自定义广告过滤规则和在页面上标记广告。
- 网页暗黑模式。

隐私策略：[https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUfbf5ciLDV9oYRgJ6Evc](https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUfbf5ciLDV9oYRgJ6Evc)
服务条款：[https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm](https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm)

欢迎访问我们的开源版本地址 [https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay](https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay)
任何问题可以关注官方推特 @stayfork 来反馈。
欢迎加入电报群组 [t.me/fastclipchat](http://t.me/fastclipchat)

hk.description:
蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

hk.description:
让自己沉浸在《沙丘》的世界中。
在屡获殊荣的棋盘游戏《沙丘：帝国》中，穿梭于地形险恶的厄拉科斯星球，体验策略与阴谋的终极融合！
"在线对战、与人工智能进行本地对战，或与强大的哈葛尔家族对战。
获得成就，展示你作为领袖的实力。
面对十数种挑战，考验你的智慧和狡黠。
在轮换的遭遇战模式中争夺徽章，每场比赛都不尽相同！"
控制香料，就是控制宇宙。
厄拉科斯、沙丘、沙漠星球。在面前的广袤荒原上高举你的旗帜。当立法会各大家族调集军队和间谍时，你将影响谁，又将背叛谁？暴虐的皇帝、神秘的贝尼·杰瑟里特、精明的宇航公会、沙漠深处凶残的弗雷曼人。帝国的力量可以属于你，但战争并不是夺取力量的唯一途径。
《沙丘：帝国》是一款主题鲜明的全新战略游戏，融合了牌组搭建和工人放置的元素，将帝国的命运掌握在你手中。你会寻求政治盟友还是依靠军事力量？靠经济实力还是耍阴谋诡计？让议会席位决定……还是亮出锋利的刀刃？拿好手牌，决定在你手中，帝国正在等待。

hk.description:
《Halls of Torment》是一款生存遊戲，畫面採用預先渲染的復古風，類似於1990年代晚期的角色扮演遊戲。從多名英雄角色中選擇一名操控，並進入致命的苦痛殿堂闖蕩。對抗不潔的恐怖生物，並在敵人一波波的攻勢下努力求生，直到其中一位苦痛領主登場。使用角色特長、技能和物品強化英雄。在闖關過程中打造全新強力流派。探索地底的各個地方，尋找全新強力物品，讓你能夠闖入更黑暗的深淵。

2023年Steam年度最佳肉鸽遊戲Halls of Torment現已上線移動端，快來加入這場90年代復古風格ARPG的生存挑戰吧！

【遊戲特色】
◆闖關只要30分鐘，輕鬆又快速
◆ 經典預先渲染美術風格
◆ 任務導向的遊戲進程
◆ 多種不同的技能、特長和物品可供選擇，讓你搭配出有趣的組合
◆ 各種不同的頭目，主打獨特機製和攻擊模式
◆ 多名各具特色的角色，讓你能夠體驗多種玩法
◆ 解鎖並探索多個有趣且高難度的地底世界
◆ 可送回遊戲主世界並用於後續闖關的獨特物品
◆ 調製魔法藥水，讓命運女神祝你一臂之力
◆ 解鎖各個職業的力量，並和你指定的角色結合
◆ 找到稀有版本的物品，進一步優化你的流派配置

【完整內容清單】 
◆6個關卡，環境各具特色
◆11名可扮演角色和角色印記
◆25個祝福，能在闖關過程中使你強大
◆68種不同的物品可供收集和解鎖
◆240個稀有度更高版本的物品
◆74個技能和技能升級
◆36個神器，可用來調整遊戲體驗
◆超過35個獨特首領
◆超過70種獨特怪物
◆超過500個任務可完成
◆超過1000個特長，可用來升級角色和技能

遊戲內容還在不斷推陳出新，日後還能玩到更豐富精彩的內容！

【聯係我們】
Discord: @Erabit 或點擊鏈接 https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB
Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
hk.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.trackCensoredName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
hk.trackName: Kingdom Rush Frontiers 塔防生存戰爭
hk.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

hk.trackName: MenubarX - 強大的選單列瀏覽器
hk.releaseNotes:
- 新增：可以自訂網絡代理（HTTP/Socks5）
- 新增：支援從首頁刪除書籤
hk.description:
MenubarX 是一款強大的 Mac 菜單欄瀏覽器，把網頁添加到菜單欄上，像原生 App 一樣即開即用，為你打開 Web Apps 的新世界。

- 榮登 ProductHunt 日榜和周榜評獎
- 被海外媒體評選為最值得常駐的菜單欄應用

完美支持各種 Web、Wap、PWA 網站，再也不用煩惱沒有官方 App 的服務了，僅需一個鏈接便可享用全部功能。在菜單欄即可擁有 iPhone、iPad 甚至是 Kindle 模擬器，是 Mac 用戶的提效利器，也是兼顧勞逸結合的神器，聽音樂、看視頻、玩游戲，真正做到隨開隨用。

多達 29+ 功能點：
1.無限標簽頁，無限可能
2.無限書簽收藏
3.自定義首頁
4.支持 AdBlock 自動廣告屏蔽
5.支持自定義JS/CSS腳本
6.豐富的 Web Apps
7.置頂視窗，不遮擋
8.摘下視窗，不受束縛
9.移動設備模擬器
10.切換用戶代理
11.調節尺寸，響應式佈局
12.自動刷新，想你所想
13.老闆鍵
14.深色模式
15.豐富的快捷鍵
16.支持 5 種語言
17.下載管理器
18.彩色網站圖標
19.網站通知推送
20.地址欄快捷搜索
21.原生應用模式
22.音頻持續後台播放
23.本地開發調試
24.第三方整合
25.自定義網站圖標
26.更低資源消耗
27.支持iCloud同步/備份
28.自動銷毀頁面以釋放資源 
29.支持本地文件預覽
30.自定義用戶代理
31.網頁深色模式
32.自訂網路代理（HTTP/Socks5）

更多強大功能持續開發中...
也歡迎在 Twitter(@MenubarX) 或 MenubarX@gmail.com 上反饋和建議

hk.description:
蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

hk.trackCensoredName: Stay for Safari - 瀏覽器伴侶
hk.releaseNotes:
1. 支援過濾規則自動更新
2. 修復已知問題
hk.description:
# 100萬Safari瀏覽器用戶的選擇，新一代瀏覽器擴充平台。

Stay是一款Safari瀏覽器擴充功能增強應用，透過Stay可以大幅提升Safari瀏覽器的瀏覽體驗與可玩性。

Stay支援蘋果全平台，一次付費即可涵蓋 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 裝置。

安裝Stay後，你的Safari瀏覽器增加了什麼功能？
- 【使用者腳本】安裝或編寫使用者腳本，讓你的Safari支援自動翻頁、沉浸式翻譯、防止跳躍、聚合搜尋等等功能。
- 【廣告攔截】支援Adguard、uBlock Origin、AdBlock Plus等基於EasyList規範的過濾規則，讓你的瀏覽更加安全潔淨。

買斷Stay Pro
- 全平台同步腳本內容以及設定。
- 新增自訂廣告過濾規則和在頁面上標記廣告。
- 網頁暗黑模式。

隱私權策略：[https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUfbf5ciLDV9oYRgJ6Evc](https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUUfRcicJVfbo)
服務條款：[https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm](https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm)

歡迎造訪我們的開源版本位址 [https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay](https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay)
任何問題可以關注官方推特 @stayfork 來反饋。
歡迎加入電報群組 [t.me/fastclipchat](http://t.me/fastclipchat)

hk.description:
It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

mo.description:
让自己沉浸在《沙丘》的世界中。
在屡获殊荣的棋盘游戏《沙丘：帝国》中，穿梭于地形险恶的厄拉科斯星球，体验策略与阴谋的终极融合！
"在线对战、与人工智能进行本地对战，或与强大的哈葛尔家族对战。
获得成就，展示你作为领袖的实力。
面对十数种挑战，考验你的智慧和狡黠。
在轮换的遭遇战模式中争夺徽章，每场比赛都不尽相同！"
控制香料，就是控制宇宙。
厄拉科斯、沙丘、沙漠星球。在面前的广袤荒原上高举你的旗帜。当立法会各大家族调集军队和间谍时，你将影响谁，又将背叛谁？暴虐的皇帝、神秘的贝尼·杰瑟里特、精明的宇航公会、沙漠深处凶残的弗雷曼人。帝国的力量可以属于你，但战争并不是夺取力量的唯一途径。
《沙丘：帝国》是一款主题鲜明的全新战略游戏，融合了牌组搭建和工人放置的元素，将帝国的命运掌握在你手中。你会寻求政治盟友还是依靠军事力量？靠经济实力还是耍阴谋诡计？让议会席位决定……还是亮出锋利的刀刃？拿好手牌，决定在你手中，帝国正在等待。

《Halls of Torment》是一款生存遊戲，畫面採用預先渲染的復古風，類似於1990年代晚期的角色扮演遊戲。從多名英雄角色中選擇一名操控，並進入致命的苦痛殿堂闖蕩。對抗不潔的恐怖生物，並在敵人一波波的攻勢下努力求生，直到其中一位苦痛領主登場。使用角色特長、技能和物品強化英雄。在闖關過程中打造全新強力流派。探索地底的各個地方，尋找全新強力物品，讓你能夠闖入更黑暗的深淵。

2023年Steam年度最佳肉鸽遊戲Halls of Torment現已上線移動端，快來加入這場90年代復古風格ARPG的生存挑戰吧！

【遊戲特色】
◆闖關只要30分鐘，輕鬆又快速
◆ 經典預先渲染美術風格
◆ 任務導向的遊戲進程
◆ 多種不同的技能、特長和物品可供選擇，讓你搭配出有趣的組合
◆ 各種不同的頭目，主打獨特機製和攻擊模式
◆ 多名各具特色的角色，讓你能夠體驗多種玩法
◆ 解鎖並探索多個有趣且高難度的地底世界
◆ 可送回遊戲主世界並用於後續闖關的獨特物品
◆ 調製魔法藥水，讓命運女神祝你一臂之力
◆ 解鎖各個職業的力量，並和你指定的角色結合
◆ 找到稀有版本的物品，進一步優化你的流派配置

【完整內容清單】 
◆6個關卡，環境各具特色
◆11名可扮演角色和角色印記
◆25個祝福，能在闖關過程中使你強大

遊戲內容還在不斷推陳出新，日後還能玩到更豐富精彩的內容！

mo.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
mo.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

mo.description:
蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

mo.description:
It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

mo.description:
# 100萬Safari瀏覽器用戶的選擇，新一代瀏覽器擴充平台。

Stay是一款Safari瀏覽器擴充功能增強應用，透過Stay可以大幅提升Safari瀏覽器的瀏覽體驗與可玩性。

Stay支援蘋果全平台，一次付費即可涵蓋 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 裝置。

安裝Stay後，你的Safari瀏覽器增加了什麼功能？
- 【使用者腳本】安裝或編寫使用者腳本，讓你的Safari支援自動翻頁、沉浸式翻譯、防止跳躍、聚合搜尋等等功能。
- 【廣告攔截】支援Adguard、uBlock Origin、AdBlock Plus等基於EasyList規範的過濾規則，讓你的瀏覽更加安全潔淨。

買斷Stay Pro
- 全平台同步腳本內容以及設定。
- 新增自訂廣告過濾規則和在頁面上標記廣告。
- 網頁暗黑模式。

隱私權策略：[https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUfbf5ciLDV9oYRgJ6Evc](https://www.privacypolicyonline.com/live.php?token=ZPXT0Jfv2diYUUfRcicJVfbo)
服務條款：[https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm](https://fastclip.app/policy/terms-stay.htm)

歡迎造訪我們的開源版本位址 [https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay](https://github.com/shenruisi/Stay)
任何問題可以關注官方推特 @stayfork 來反饋。
歡迎加入電報群組 [t.me/fastclipchat](http://t.me/fastclipchat)

tw.description:
这个App可以让你更专注地工作或学习，戒掉手机瘾，让你在工作或学习的时候远离手机，提高工作和学习的效率。

tw.description:
取得新一代專業智慧型 IPTV 播放器應用程式。

- 立即下載新一代專業 AI IPTV 播放器，享受無限娛樂！

- 立即下載，享受無限娛樂！忘掉您熟悉的所有 IPTV 應用程式！立即體驗最新創新！

- 使用此 IPTV 播放器，您可以將直播錄製為視頻，稍後再觀看。您可以立即下載喜愛的電視節目和電影。

- 如果您中途離開，可以從上次中斷的地方繼續觀看。

- 新增無限訂閱，並立即在訂閱之間切換。

- 根據需要更改類別或頻道名稱，將其拖曳到所需的順序，並立即加密。

- 使用多螢幕功能同時觀看多個頻道，使用家長監護功能（PIN 碼）加密您喜愛的頻道，4K 廣播畫質讓您告別卡頓問題。

- 新增 M3U（EPG）訂閱鏈接，使用 Xtream API 登錄，即可新增無限訂閱。使用“繼續觀看”功能觀看錯過的節目。本應用程式支援多種語言。

- 一次購買，永久使用。無廣告，無需每月續訂。如果您想新增訂閱或有任何其他疑問，請隨時與我們聯絡。

功能：
- 多語言支援（所有語言）
- 錄製直播。
- 下載您喜愛的電影和電視節目。
- 拖放操作即可對類別和頻道進行排序。
- 根據需要更改類別和頻道名稱。
- 從上次中斷的地方繼續觀看電影或電視劇（繼續觀看功能）。
- 為應用程式添加電子節目指南 (EPG) 連結。
- 以最佳 4K 畫質觀賞直播、電影和電視劇。
- 先進的新一代 4K 播放器
- 觀看串流媒體，無中斷或緩衝（取決於您的網速）
- 新增外部播放器（例如，從應用程式商店下載並新增 VLC）
- 支援 Xstream API
- 錄製並分享您的直播。
- 截取螢幕截圖。
- M3U 檔案和 URL（播放清單）

tw.description:
让自己沉浸在《沙丘》的世界中。
在屡获殊荣的棋盘游戏《沙丘：帝国》中，穿梭于地形险恶的厄拉科斯星球，体验策略与阴谋的终极融合！
"在线对战、与人工智能进行本地对战，或与强大的哈葛尔家族对战。
获得成就，展示你作为领袖的实力。
面对十数种挑战，考验你的智慧和狡黠。
在轮换的遭遇战模式中争夺徽章，每场比赛都不尽相同！"
控制香料，就是控制宇宙。
厄拉科斯、沙丘、沙漠星球。在面前的广袤荒原上高举你的旗帜。当立法会各大家族调集军队和间谍时，你将影响谁，又将背叛谁？暴虐的皇帝、神秘的贝尼·杰瑟里特、精明的宇航公会、沙漠深处凶残的弗雷曼人。帝国的力量可以属于你，但战争并不是夺取力量的唯一途径。
《沙丘：帝国》是一款主题鲜明的全新战略游戏，融合了牌组搭建和工人放置的元素，将帝国的命运掌握在你手中。你会寻求政治盟友还是依靠军事力量？靠经济实力还是耍阴谋诡计？让议会席位决定……还是亮出锋利的刀刃？拿好手牌，决定在你手中，帝国正在等待。

tw.description:
《Halls of Torment》是一款生存遊戲，畫面採用預先渲染的復古風，類似於1990年代晚期的角色扮演遊戲。從多名英雄角色中選擇一名操控，並進入致命的苦痛殿堂闖蕩。對抗不潔的恐怖生物，並在敵人一波波的攻勢下努力求生，直到其中一位苦痛領主登場。使用角色特長、技能和物品強化英雄。在闖關過程中打造全新強力流派。探索地底的各個地方，尋找全新強力物品，讓你能夠闖入更黑暗的深淵。

2023年Steam年度最佳肉鸽遊戲Halls of Torment現已上線移動端，快來加入這場90年代復古風格ARPG的生存挑戰吧！

【遊戲特色】
◆闖關只要30分鐘，輕鬆又快速
◆ 經典預先渲染美術風格
◆ 任務導向的遊戲進程
◆ 多種不同的技能、特長和物品可供選擇，讓你搭配出有趣的組合
◆ 各種不同的頭目，主打獨特機製和攻擊模式
◆ 多名各具特色的角色，讓你能夠體驗多種玩法
◆ 解鎖並探索多個有趣且高難度的地底世界
◆ 可送回遊戲主世界並用於後續闖關的獨特物品
◆ 調製魔法藥水，讓命運女神祝你一臂之力
◆ 解鎖各個職業的力量，並和你指定的角色結合
◆ 找到稀有版本的物品，進一步優化你的流派配置

【完整內容清單】 
◆6個關卡，環境各具特色
◆11名可扮演角色和角色印記
◆25個祝福，能在闖關過程中使你強大
◆68種不同的物品可供收集和解鎖
◆240個稀有度更高版本的物品
◆74個技能和技能升級
◆36個神器，可用來調整遊戲體驗
◆超過35個獨特首領
◆超過70種獨特怪物
◆超過500個任務可完成
◆超過1000個特長，可用來升級角色和技能

遊戲內容還在不斷推陳出新，日後還能玩到更豐富精彩的內容！

【聯係我們】
Discord: @Erabit 或點擊鏈接 https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB
Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
tw.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

tw.description:
蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

tw.description:
It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

蒼莽原始大陸上，古木參天，史前異獸穿梭其間，蠻荒氣息撲面而來。你身為部落勇士，將在這片充滿未知的土地上，馴服異獸、集結夥伴、建立家族，開啟一場跨越原始荒野的冒險之旅。

·遊戲特點

[寵物馴化核心]
多種原始元素屬性建構戰力基礎，屬性間暗藏克制規律，帶來戰略變數！
數百種史前異獸各有特色，可透過野外捕捉、日常福利、召喚獲取，不同玩家都能找到心儀寵物！
寵物可進階覺醒、搭配專屬裝備，打造屬於自己的特色戰寵陣容！

[資源狂歡盛宴]
每日簽到即可領取補給，區服與全服達成通關目標時，還能解鎖全服狂歡獎勵，協助成長！
掛機收益與冒險進度相關，即使離線也能取得資源，讓戰力提升不停歇！

[無限蠻荒旅程]
全自動掛機戰鬥解放雙手，角色與寵物可在冒險中持續升級進化，戰力穩定提升！
從初始營地出發，穿越多元原始場景，每個場景都有新的異獸與隱藏內容等待探索！
解鎖專屬增益系統，可加速掛機收益，輕鬆向更高戰力衝刺！

[多元玩法矩陣]
涵蓋狩獵、競技對決、跨服對戰、複製挑戰等多種玩法，滿足不同冒險需求，讓探索不枯燥！
副本支援單人或組隊參與，搭配隨機增益效果，助力攻克難關、獲得高級獎勵！

[家族榮耀戰歌]
家族莊園可共同建設，成員共享成長收益；定期開啟家族 BOSS 戰、家族戰與家族副本，合力戰贏取珍稀獎勵，壯大族群實力！

[新手輔助計畫]
新玩家登入即送強力夥伴，完成成長任務可保底獲取高階寵物，快速組成戰鬥隊伍！
老玩家專屬支援福利，包含稀有道具，協助快速追平戰力差距；材料收集系統優化，讓成長更輕鬆！

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

us.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. 

Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.

Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.

Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.

Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!

Control the Spice. Control the Universe.

Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat… or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

us.description:
Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. 

Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss.

First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile!

【Features】
◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs
◆ Old school pre-rendered art style
◆ Quest-based meta progression
◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds
◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs
◆ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor
◆ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character
◆ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds

【Full Content List】
◆6 stages with unique environments
◆11 playable characters & character marks
◆25 blessings that make you stronger for each run
◆68 unique items to retrieve and unlock
◆240 higher rarity item variants
◆74 abilities and ability upgrades
◆36 artifacts to customize your game experience
◆35+ unique bosses
◆70+ unique monsters
◆500 quests to complete
◆1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! 

【Contact Us】
Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB
Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

us.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
us.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

us.description:
Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit.
Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp.

BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS!


• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!

• 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up.

• UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.

• Fortify the frontier in exotic news lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld!

TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES


• 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies!

• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL


• OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before!

• MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades...

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT


• Hours of army with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements!

• IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up!

• CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills!

• 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode!

• PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline!

-----------------------------------------------------

PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5

us.description:
It's the game The New York Times called a "Sensation!" and Cosmopolitan raved “Your existence is dull and meaningless without this life-changing app!”

Get ready for endless fun with Heads Up!, the exhilarating charades-style party game that's taking the world by storm. Guess the words on the screen as your friends and family shout out clues.

With diverse categories ranging from Celebrities to Movies and Hilarious Accents, Heads Up! guarantees hours of laughter for everyone involved.

Now available to play through Facetime - where you can play with friends and family all over the world!

How to Play:
1. Select from over 100 themed decks or create your own custom category!
2. Hold the phone to your forehead and let the word guessing commence!
3. Tilt down for correct answers and up to pass on challenging words.
4. Keep the fun rolling with an extensive library of engaging trivia cards!

Decks You’ll Get:
- Celebrity Quiz
- Blockbuster Movies
- Animals
- Accents
- Superheroes
- Famous Characters
- And lots more!

Features:
- Enjoy group play with friends, team, or even hundreds of players simultaneously.
- Draw new word cards with a simple tilt of your phone.
- Keep priceless memories by recording gameplay videos to keep for yourself or share on social media
- Entertain everyone from trivia buffs to casual players with various difficulty levels.
- Updated frequently with seasonal and topical fun, plus huge brands like Harry Potter, Marvel, Seinfeld, Friends, Star Wars, and much more!

Heads Up! is the ultimate party game that combines the best elements of charades, trivia, and light-hearted team competition. Whether you're looking to liven up a family gathering or a game night with friends, this app is your ticket to endless fun. It's your super-affordable way to bring joy and laughter to any occasion. 

Download Heads Up! now and let the unforgettable guessing games begin!

us.description:
# The choice of one million Safari browser users, the next-generation browser extension platform. 

Stay is a Safari browser extension that enhances browsing experience and interactivity to a great extent. With Stay, users can greatly improve their Safari browsing experience and make it more enjoyable.

Stay supports all Apple platforms and offers a one-time payment that covers iPhone, iPad, and Mac devices.

With Stay installed, what new features can you expect in your Safari browser?
- Userscripts: Install or write your own userscripts to enable automatic page turning, immersive translation, anti-redirect, and aggregated search functions.
- Ad blocking: Support for Adguard, uBlock Origin, AdBlock Plus, and other filtering rules based on the EasyList specification, making your browsing experience safer and cleaner.

By purchasing Stay Pro, you can enjoy the following additional benefits:
- Synchronization of script content and settings across all platforms.
- Add custom ad filtering rules and tag ads on pages.
- Dark mode for web pages.

tr.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. 

Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.

Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.

Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.

Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!

Control the Spice. Control the Universe.

Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat… or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

tr.description:
Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. 

Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss.

First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile!

【Features】
◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs
◆ Old school pre-rendered art style
◆ Quest-based meta progression
◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds
◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs
◆ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor
◆ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character
◆ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds

【Full Content List】
◆6 stages with unique environments
◆11 playable characters & character marks
◆25 blessings that make you stronger for each run
◆68 unique items to retrieve and unlock
◆240 higher rarity item variants
◆74 abilities and ability upgrades
◆36 artifacts to customize your game experience
◆35+ unique bosses
◆70+ unique monsters
◆500 quests to complete
◆1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! 

【Contact Us】
Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB
Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

tr.releaseNotes:
The Woodland is getting wilder! Hirelings & Landmarks arrives soon with new ways to shape the map, and fresh faces to sway the balance of power!
Alongside the new expansion, we’ve shipped a broad round of polish based on your feedback. You’ll notice tighter rules fidelity with the tabletop game, steadier performance, and smarter opponents — all aimed at improving the overall experience.
Jump in, explore new combos, and tell us what you uncover — your reports have been instrumental in making Root Digital the best it can be!

General Improvements 
* By popular demand, the Marquise Field Hospital timing now matches tabletop in all modes except online asynch play.
* Added ‘Bluff’ option when creating a game. If enabled, priority is passed to take actions regardless of the contents of players hands. Applies to Ambush, Field Hospital, Feline Physicians, and Rabbit Scouts. Only available in live timer games.
* Vagabond and Eyrie AI have been significantly improved, bringing their scores more in line with other base factions.
* Automatic camera movement is now optional and disabled by default.
* Added a deck count to the supply window.  
* VFX highlight now appears on the “maximize prompt” button.
* “Anytime” actions such as Exposure have been streamlined to minimize unnecessary extra prompt windows.
Bug Fixes

General Fixes & Improvements
* Marquise can now select any clearing for their first Homeland on the Mountain map.
* Marquise no longer counts spent wood for Rule using Soup Kitchens.
* Vagabond “Anytime in Birdsong” cards can now be used before Refresh and Slip as intended.
* Murine Brokers no longer occasionally grant multiple cards to opponents.
* Guessing Exposure incorrectly no longer lets Eyrie skip adding to the Decree.
* Correct Expose guesses no longer reveal the card to other players.
* Fixed an issue where Marquise was unable to choose all legal homeland locations on the Lake Map.
* Keepers in Iron can now choose homeland clearings correctly on the Winter Map.
* Improved several areas where AI made strange choices.
* Fixed many issues involving the Undo function.
* Improved certain areas of the Tutorial which caused confusion.

Visual & Animation
* Dominance animations now show the correct faction backgrounds for the Duchy and the Corvids.
* Some assets on the Lake map no longer overlap buildings and tokens.
* Warriors no longer appear inside the tower on the Mountain map.
* Clouds in Strategic View now blend smoothly.
* Vagabond “Quest Completed” animation now plays as expected.
* Keepers in Iron relics and Vagabonds no longer cause trees to disappear on the Winter Map.
* Trees no longer clip through the Marquise Keep when a Favor card removes the token.
* The Duchy Citadel icon now appears the same as it does in tabletop.

User Interface & Experience (UI/UX)
* Available faction icons are larger and easier to select on large-UI mobile devices.
* Some HUD elements are no longer off-screen on some dvices.
* Selecting Bird cards now works correctly when suited cards are also available for the Keepers in Iron on mobile devices.
* Vagabond icons now display correctly when using the Ferry on the Lake map in Strategic View.
* Expose now highlights the correct clearing in Strategic View.
* Wood highlights for Marquise are more visible in Strategic View.
* Vagabond targeting to strike a Keepers In Iron relic is now clear when multiple relics are stacked.
* A confirmation now appears when ending the Vagabond’s turn with actions remaining.
* Improved expanded rules for Marquise wood cost visualization.
* Field Hospitals prompts no longer block Riverfolk purchase prompts at turn start.
* Winter map icons no longer cover neighboring clearing costs.

And many more! See you in the clearings!
tr.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode.

The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched.

Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support.

Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data.

Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

Amidst the rock piles in the primeval jungle, Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus Rex, and Pteranodons are scattered and stacked—chaos is about to sweep through the tribe! As the top "organizer" in the tribe, your only mission is to **tap three identical dinosaurs to eliminate them from the pile**! But remember: the inventory slot below has limited space. Once it’s filled up with uneliminated dinosaurs, your primeval cleanup mission will fail immediately! This isn’t a casual game of random taps; it’s a strategic, forward-thinking brain challenge. Every choice you make determines whether you can survive the dino frenzy until the end!

# Primeval Item Vault: Three "Lifesavers" to Break the Deadlock!
When you’re cornered by a full inventory of dinosaurs and can’t find a matchable set, the three heirloom items of the tribe become your "last chance to turn the tide":
- **Corn**: Is your inventory slot about to overflow? Use Corn to instantly clear out all selected dinosaurs in the slot, free up space with one tap, and let you replan your elimination order!
- **Fig**: Missing just one dinosaur to complete a Match-3? The Fig will automatically lock onto the target dinosaur in your inventory, directly complete the set elimination, and help you break through the "stuck" predicament!
- **Meat**: Are the dinosaurs on the field piled in disarray with no elimination opportunities in sight? Meat will completely shuffle the arrangement of all remaining dinosaurs, making new matchable sets take the initiative to "appear"!

## Core Gameplay: Every Step is a "Life-or-Death Prediction"!
The difficulty of Primeval Match-3 lies in its "stacking logic" and "inventory management": Dinosaurs on the field are layered and covered—some hidden at the bottom layer, others blocked by other dinosaurs. You can’t just look at the surface; you must first observe the types of dinosaurs in the lower layers, predict "what will be exposed after eliminating the upper layer," and then decide which set to eliminate first. For example: Eliminating 3 Pteranodons in the upper layer first may unlock 3 Triceratops in the bottom layer; but if you mindlessly tap scattered dinosaurs, you’ll only fill up the inventory quickly and end up failing due to a full slot!

As the levels progress, the number of dinosaur types will exceed 10, and the stacking layers will increase from 2 to 7 or 8. Some dinosaurs are hidden in "dead corners," while others require 2-3 consecutive eliminations to unlock. Only with patient analysis and careful choices can you avoid the crisis of a full inventory and clear all dinosaurs step by step!

The elimination horn in the primeval jungle has sounded! Bring your strategic mind, make good use of your available items, find every breakthrough in the chaotic pile of dinosaurs, and don’t let the inventory slot become your "stumbling block"—set off now and become the "Primeval Match-3 Champion" admired by everyone in the tribe

tr.description:
It’s the game The New York Times called a “Sensation,” and Cosmopolitan said “will be the best dollar you’ve spent.” Heads Up! is the fun and hilarious game by Ellen DeGeneres that she plays on the Ellen show, and is one of the best games to play with friends!


Love playing charades games? Heads Up! is just that, a fun twist on charades! From naming celebrities, to singing, to silly accents - guess the word on the card that’s on your head from your friends’ clues before the timer runs out!


Play one of the many exciting categories, including fun game decks like Harry Potter, Friends, and Marvel, or create a category all your own!


How to play Heads Up:

Pick a card deck category - check! One player holds the phone to their glorious forehead like a headband, and 3, 2, 1! Go! Guess the words on the screen as your friends excitedly shout out clues. Got an answer right? Ding! Tilt your head down and keep on ruling this guessing game, you genius! Can’t guess what it is? Don’t stress! Just tilt your head up and skip to a new catch phrase. So get your head on straight, and enjoy one of the best party games!


Cool Game Features:

- A fun game for friends, family game night, or to play with hundreds of players at once!

- Draw a new game card simply by tilting your phone!

- Guess what! You can keep videos of your hilarious game play for your own amusement, or share them right to Facebook

- Like to play games on zoom? Take your Heads Up game online

- Diverse categories let you challenge your smartypants friends and entertain your kids for hours, all from one app!


With 40+themed decks packed to the brim with exciting gameplay cards, the fun will never stop!


Card Decks include:

- Celebrities

- Movies

- Animals

- Accents

- Superheroes

- Characters

- And lots more!


Game night fans, your new favorite charades app is here!

Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

tr.description:
# The choice of one million Safari browser users, the next-generation browser extension platform. 

Stay is a Safari browser extension that enhances browsing experience and interactivity to a great extent. With Stay, users can greatly improve their Safari browsing experience and make it more enjoyable.

Stay supports all Apple platforms and offers a one-time payment that covers iPhone, iPad, and Mac devices.

With Stay installed, what new features can you expect in your Safari browser?
- Userscripts: Install or write your own userscripts to enable automatic page turning, immersive translation, anti-redirect, and aggregated search functions.
- Ad blocking: Support for Adguard, uBlock Origin, AdBlock Plus, and other filtering rules based on the EasyList specification, making your browsing experience safer and cleaner.

By purchasing Stay Pro, you can enjoy the following additional benefits:
- Synchronization of script content and settings across all platforms.
- Add custom ad filtering rules and tag ads on pages.
- Dark mode for web pages.

tr.description:
Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit.
Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp.

BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS!
• OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies!
• 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up.
• UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.
• Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld!

TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES
• 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies!
• Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon!

DEFEAT THEM ALL
• OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before!
• MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades...

MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT
• Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements!
• IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up!
• CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills!
• 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode!
• PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline!

Halls of Torment é um jogo de sobrevivência contra hordas com um visual retrô pré-renderizado, reminiscente dos RPGs dos anos 90. Escolha um dos muitos personagens heróis e desça aos Mortais Salões da Tormenta. Lute contra horrores profanos do além e sobreviva a onda após onda de inimigos até enfrentar um dos Senhores atormentados.

Fortaleça seu herói com características, habilidades e itens. Crie uma nova construção poderosa a cada partida. Explore diversas expansões subterrâneas e encontre novos itens poderosos que permitem aventurar-se ainda mais no abismo.
